description.@en: A curse of the depths is lain upon the unworthy, made fragile before you.

criticalFailure.@en: The rod of the ancient seat creature dissolves, turning into silt between your fingers. You immediately suffer a Grievous Injury, and begin to Bleed.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but your foes also begin to Bleed.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of foes equal to your [WB]. Each foe suffers a Grievous Injury.

reagents.@en: A bone rod made from a deep sea monster
